channel.title: [bug] Endless Lambda core last scene [Fixed]
channel.description:
Hey,
I've encountered a bug that i didn't find searching the forums.
At the end of lambda core, when entering the huge room that creates the badass fps drops, I killed the scientist while he was presenting himself : ends up that nothing happens, the portal opening process cannot begin, but the game isn't ending (Game Over) either, whereas nothing more can happen.

item.title: [bug] Endless Lambda core last scene [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: Georges
item.description:
Please continue discussion on the bug tracker issue.

Read full topic

item.title: [bug] Endless Lambda core last scene [Fixed]

item.description:
Precisely, i didn’t find the proper thread (as i mentionned). Sorry then

Read full topic

item.title: [bug] Endless Lambda core last scene [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: lexa2
item.description:
Already reported, use search button in future before reporting a problem. Anyways, thanks for spending your time posting a report.

Read full topic

Hey,

I’ve encountered a bug that i didn’t find searching the forums.

At the end of lambda core, when entering the huge room that creates the badass fps drops, I killed the scientist while he was presenting himself : ends up that nothing happens, the portal opening process cannot begin, but the game isn’t ending (Game Over) either, whereas nothing more can happen.
